suggest.ocramius/proxy-manager: To support injection of runtime generated proxies
suggest.zendframework/zend-xmlrpc: To support XML-RPC remote object activation
suggest.zendframework/zend-json: To support JSON-RPC remote object activation
suggest.zendframework/zend-soap: To support SOAP remote object activation
suggest.guzzle/guzzle: To support RESTful remote object activation
